EDIT:dammit

(Companies must engage in 2 or more battles to be added)

well I think thats why... better get a battle in

Well all the ships have both anyway, not that it matters with the larger weapons, they will go through most armor anyway. Hey I was thinking for the first three battles the guy with the least amount of battles gets to go first but after that we can flip a coin so to speak. Because after three battles the handicap is kinda pointless.
so how's that video comeing along?

Well with my mic out of commission i Have footage but no way to tell anyone what they are looking at. Gamestop wont take it back so i called corporate and yelled at them about it and they want me to spend $10 to ship it to them so that they can "fix it". I figured out the problem with them and its like a 3 year old designed it. The + - that run through the headset to the mic have exposed ends near the mic that after a while start to touch and short out the mic. All they would have to do is stic a small bit of scrap cardboard or paper or anything with a good amount of ohms and your have fixed your problem costing you nothing in materials and only adding 1c to the cost of 100 units. Worth not having to return and fix thousands of headsets.

But i still have to buy a new one and get the money i spent back for the old one. They have such a bad rep on line and everyone is having the same problem. One guy even bragged about his lasting almost 7 months before it gave out. So it will be easy to get it all back, they have to follow a standard of quality and are obviously not.

I may try to fix the darn thing as long as the magnet and pot in the headset aren't fried to bad. There is a little resister in the mic head too that has to be in good condition to and if its scorched all hope is lost.

Edited November 1, 2013 by camulus777
